Control.Name: ShareButton
Control.Tooltip: Share your settings with group members.

Control.Text: Making this Addon was a lot of work!
Control.Name: TextLine1

Control.Text: Please consider supporting the continued development and maintenance of LUI Aura with an ingame gold donation. Thank you very much in advcance! <3
Control.Name: TextLine2
Always
Control.Tooltip: This aura will always be shown

Control.Name: All
Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when all triggers pass.

Control.Name: Any
Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: None
Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when all triggers fail.

Control.Tooltip: This aura will always be shown

Control.Name: Any
Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when any trigger passes.

Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when all triggers fail.

Control.Name: Pass
Control.Tooltip: Trigger succeeds if check for trigger settings passes.

Control.Name: Fail
Control.Tooltip: Trigger succeeds if check for trigger settings fails.

Control.Name: DynamicDirectionDropdown
Control.Tooltip: Determines in which direction auras will get added to the group.

Control.Name: Left
Control.Tooltip: Play sound when all trigger pass.

Control.Name: Right
Control.Tooltip: Play Sound when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: Up
Control.Tooltip: Play Sound when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: Down
Control.Tooltip: Play sound when all trigger fail.

Control.Name: DynamicGrowthDropdown
Control.Tooltip: Determines in which direction the group will growth once one row is completed.

Control.Name: Left
Control.Tooltip: Play sound when all trigger pass.

Control.Name: Right
Control.Tooltip: Play Sound when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: Up
Control.Tooltip: Play Sound when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: Down
Control.Tooltip: Play sound when all trigger fail.

Control.Name: Slider
Control.Tooltip: Set the amount of seconds, added to the Buff Duration. (Grace Period before buff is declared missing.)

Control.Name: Slider
Control.Tooltip: Set the amount of seconds, added to the Buff Duration. (Grace Period before buff is declared missing.)

Control.Name: SpellName
Control.Tooltip: Type in the Name of your Gadget.

Control.Name: ShowDescCheckbox
Control.Tooltip: Show Aura Description as Tooltip on Icon.

Control.Name: IconSourceDropdown
Control.Tooltip: Icon will get loaded and changed dynamically, depending on the chosen trigger.

Control.Name: IconAnchorDropdown
Control.Tooltip: Choose if your aura should be bound on your screen or on top of a unit. (Experimental)

Control.Name: IconStrataSlider
Control.Tooltip: Frame Strata decides whether or not an aura gets displayed above or benieth another aura.

Control.Name: Always
Control.Tooltip: This aura will always be shown

Control.Name: Any
Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: None
Control.Tooltip: This aura will be shown when all triggers fail.

Control.Name: Pass
Control.Tooltip: Change icon color when trigger passes.

Control.Name: Fail
Control.Tooltip: Change icon color when trigger fails.

Control.Name: ForceSoundCheckbox
Control.Tooltip: Let you hear the sound even with game sounds muted. Only enable this option if your game sound is muted!

Control.Name: All
Control.Tooltip: Play sound when all trigger pass.

Control.Name: Any
Control.Tooltip: Play Sound when any trigger passes.

Control.Name: None
Control.Tooltip: Play sound when all trigger fail.

Control.Tooltip: Change icon color when trigger passes.

Control.Name: Fail
